name: bar
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: bar
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a place where drinks, especially alcoholic drinks, are sold and drunk, or the area in such a place where the person serving the drinks stands

example.eg: They noticed him going into the hotel bar.
example.egtrans: 他们看见他进了宾馆酒吧间。

example.eg: There weren't any free tables, so I sat at the bar.
example.egtrans: 没有空桌子了，我只好坐在吧台旁。

example.eg: Why don't you ask the guy behind the bar (= serving drinks there)?
example.egtrans: 你怎么不问一问吧台里的那个服务员？

dsense.name: bar
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a long, thin, straight piece of metal or wood

example.eg: The gorilla rattled the bars of its cage.
example.egtrans: 大猩猩把笼子的铁栅栏弄得吱嘎吱嘎响。

trans_examp.trans_en: a substance that has been made into a solid rectangular shape
The bar of an electric heater is a long, thin wire in the shape of a spring that is wrapped tightly around a tube. When electricity passes through it, it produces heat and red light.

dsense.name: bar
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: one of the small equal parts into which a piece of music is divided, containing a fixed number of beats

example.eg: Waltzes have three beats in/to the bar (= in each bar).

trans_examp.trans_en: a vertical line that divides one bar from another in a written piece of music

dsense.name: bar
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: bar
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: something that prevents a particular event or development from happening
trans_examp.trans_cn: 阻碍某事发生或发展的东西

example.eg: A lack of formal education is no bar to becoming rich.
example.egtrans: 没有接受正规教育并不妨碍致富。

name: bar
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: bar
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to prevent something or someone from doing something or going somewhere, or to not allow something

example.eg: The centre of the town was barred to football supporters.
The incident led to him being barred from the country/barred from entering the country.
example.egtrans: 这起事件导致他被禁止进入该国。

example.eg: I tried to push past her but she barred my way/path (= stood in front of me and prevented me from getting past).
example.egtrans: 我试图从她旁边挤过去，但她还是挡住了我的去路。

dsense.name: bar
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to put bars across something, especially to keep it closed

example.eg: We barred the door to stop anyone getting into the room.
example.egtrans: 我们闩上门以防有人进入房间。

name: bar
posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

example.eg: Everyone is leaving the village, bar the very old and ill.
example.egtrans: 除了年老体弱者，其他人都要离开村庄。

example.eg: They're the best songwriters of this century, bar none (= no one else is better).
example.egtrans: 他们是本世纪最优秀的曲作者，无人能比。

name: the Bar
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: lawyers who are allowed to argue a case in a higher court
all lawyers thought of as a group

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to gain a qualification as a lawyer who can argue a case in a higher court
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 取得（出席高级法庭的）大律师资格，成为（出席高级法庭的）大律师

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: to gain a qualification as a lawyer
dsense_body_def_block_kk.ddef_b_trans: 取得律师资格，成为律师
